title: Crystal Drop organisers
description: Elegant teardrop crystals that catch the light beautifully. These stunning organisers feature genuine Swarovski crystals suspended from sterling silver hooks, creating a sophisticated look perfect for any occasion.

title: Pearl Cluster Studs
description: Delicate clusters of freshwater pearls arranged in a timeless design. These versatile studs add an elegant touch to both casual and formal outfits.

title: Butterfly Charm Hoops
description: Playful butterfly charms dangle from delicate gold hoops. These whimsical organisers are perfect for adding a touch of fun to your everyday look.

title: Moon & Star Dangles
description: Celestial-inspired organisers featuring a crescent moon and star design. Adorned with sparkling cubic zirconia stones that twinkle like the night sky.

title: Heart Charm Studs
description: Sweet and simple heart-shaped studs in a beautiful rose gold finish. The perfect gift for someone special or a lovely treat for yourself.

title: Crystal Cascade organisers
description: Statement organisers featuring cascading crystals that create a waterfall effect. Perfect for special occasions when you want to make an impression.

title: Minimal Geometric Holder
description: Modern geometric organisers holder designed to beautifully display your Desk Organisers. 3D printed using eco-friendly PLA filament sourced from UK suppliers.

title: Wave Pattern Holder
description: Elegant wave-inspired design that holds up to 20 pairs of organisers. The organic curves create a stunning display piece for your dresser or vanity.

title: Daisy Chain Drops
description: Charming daisy flower drops that bring a touch of spring to any outfit. Hand-painted enamel details create a unique, artisan look.

title: Mini Hoop Collection
description: Classic mini hoops encrusted with delicate micro crystals. Perfect for everyday wear, these versatile hoops complement any style.
